kpi.name: sgsn_838a

kpi_info.title: Rejected Iu RAU attempts in 2nd OL control point
kpi_info.use: This KPI shows the amount of Iu RA update attempts rejected at the second overload control point because of overload registered by the PAPU.

kpi.kpi_alias: Rejected Iu RAU attempts in 2nd OL control point
